## Conditions.Convert.validatedConditionDecl variable

Converter which constructs a [validated condition declaration](./ts-res.conditions.ivalidatedconditiondecl.md) from a [condition declaration](./ts-res.conditions.iconditiondecl.md)<!-- -->, instantiating qualifiers by name from a supplied [conversion context](./ts-res.conditions.convert.iconditiondeclconvertcontext.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validatedConditionDecl: import("@fgv/ts-utils").Converter<IValidatedConditionDecl, IConditionDeclConvertContext>
```
